[i]Hide[/i] – Whenever Selkie, Simple Fox deals combat damage to a player, you may cloak her and up to one target creature.
[i]Seek [/i]– Whenever Selkie is turned face up, investigate and add {R}{W}.
Disguise {R}{W} [i](You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)[/i]
